title: (Thurs Early Bird) Amy is Accused of Being Creepy Online + Former BBS Intern Is Now on an MTV show!
itunes:title: (Thurs Early Bird) Amy is Accused of Being Creepy Online + Former BBS Intern Is Now on an MTV show!
description:
Amy is accused of being creepy online after offering a guy the option to video chat. Our former intern, Lexie Hayden calls in to talk about the new MTV show she is on called “Becoming a Pop Star”. We also play a round of Amy vs. Lunchbox.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
